result.eng: I am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ga: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.orig: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom

result.ponchtml: Tá mé go mór faoi ċomaoin agat as an tacaíoċt a ṫug tú domI am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
